content:
Professorship for ethics, technology and society. Deadline for applications: March 2021
https://ethz.ch/de/die-eth-zuerich/arbeiten-lehren-forschen/faculty-affairs/ausgeschriebene-professuren/management-und-sozialwissenschaften/professor-of-ethics--technology-and-society.html

Professur für Ethics, Technology and Society
The Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences (D-GESS, www.gess.ethz.ch) at ETH Zurich invites applications for the above-mentioned position.
